title: União de Santarém
text:
União Desportiva de Santarém is a Portuguese <a href="Association%20football">football</a> club based in <a href="Santar%C3%A9m%2C%20Portugal">Santarém</a> in central <a href="Portugal">Portugal</a>. They play in the 3rd nacional division.
The club was founded in 1969 and plays at the 5,000 capacity <a href="Campo%20Ch%C3%A3%20das%20Padeiras">Campo Chã das Padeiras</a> stadium. The club has participated in the <a href="Portuguese%20Second%20Division">Portuguese Second Division</a> in the past, but has spent most of its history in the lower levels of Portuguese football.
